sense.gloss: to take out, to carry out, to bring out from where it belongs
to mention something, to broach a topic, to bring up (a subject), to raise (an issue), to mention

sdata.j: それは↑食事↑↓しょくじ↓の↑席↑↓せき↓の↑会話↑↓かいわ↓で|↑持↑↓も↓ち↑出↑↓だ↓す|のに↑適当↑↓てきとう↓ではない。
sdata.e: That is not a proper subject to bring up in conversation at the dinner table.

sdata.j: この↑棚↑↓たな↓の↑本↑↓ほん↓を|↑持↑↓も↓ち↑出↑↓だ↓す|な。
sdata.e: Don't take out the books on this shelf.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はその↑本↑↓ほん↓をこっそり|↑持↑↓も↓ち↑出↑↓だ↓す|ところを↑見↑↓み↓られた。
sdata.e: He was seen to take out the book secretly.

sdata.j: それは↑食事↑↓しょくじ↓の↑席↑↓せき↓の↑会話↑↓かいわ↓で|↑持↑↓も↓ち↑出↑↓だ↓す|のに↑適当↑↓てきとう↓ではない。
sdata.e: That's not a proper subject to bring up in conversation at the dinner table.

sdata.e: That isn't a proper subject to bring up in conversation at the dinner table.
